item.title: Biographical Notice on the life, conversation and death of Manoah, member of the Church of the Thaba-Bossiu, among the Béchuanas-Bassoutos (South Africa), 1843.” Translated by Morelli, Ettore
item.scopeAndContent:
[Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of Casalis, Eugène's “Biographical Notice on the life, conversation and death of Manoah, member of the Church of the Thaba-Bossiu, among the Béchuanas-Bassoutos (South Africa), 1843.” Translated by Morelli, Ettore. Unpublished transcript sourced from the Bibliothèque Nationale de France, translation prepared for the Archive and Public Culture research initiative, 2020 [1843].]
[Source - Ettore Morelli for FHYA, 2020: A working translation into English of the French text of the obituary by Eugène Casalis, commemorating Entouta Manoah]
